Name: Release 2.0
Description:
The 2.0 Release of Name. 

Bad News:
This release is missing Netcode as I have not yet gotten it completely working under XNA 3.0 final.
Still no sounds, or music controls (but they are coming and some of the sounds are done).

Good News:
This release runs in less memory than previous releases.
This release runs faster (upto 2x as fast)!
Easier to aim.

Name: Release 1.2 Polish and Bugfix release
Description:
Code: Some bug fixes, 
Restarting the game should work now. 
Level Selection screen. Previously played level screen (available after you have played 2 games). 

Art: Images for the new menus. 

Code for the new weapons is in but COMPLETELY un-tested, also don't have artwork for them so I can't test them. 
New Weapons are not Selectable in the weapon selection screen yet.

Name: Release 1.1 for ALL Zunes with Basic AI
Description:
New Version Available 

It has:
 Zune 30 support.
 a basic AI (1 player is always AI, so 2 players is now 1 human + 1 ai, 3 is now 2 human + 1 ai, 4 is now 3 human + 1 ai.).
 a way to end your turn (hit back to end your turn if your not shooting), you now hold back to quit.

There is a small bug, every once in a while the AI ends up aiming the wrong way and nukes its self.

Name: Name 1.0 For XNA 3.0 CTP
Description:
Since for the CTP you have to build it yourself to deploy to the Zune and I can't just pass around an executable there is no point in Adding files to this. 

Grab the source and Enjoy!

Name: Release 1.0b for XNA 3.0 CTP
Description:
This time with a zip file to be less confusing.

This is the sourcecode ( C# ), you'll need visual studio 2008 and the XNA 3.0 CTP

Name: Release 2.1 for XNA 3.0 Zune Firmware 3.1
Description:
Updated to 3.1, No more ram problems. 

This is slower (due to the 240 sprites of dimensions 1x700 drawn for the terrain). Deformable Terrain is now a possibility,

It "feels" slower than before, some animations may need to be sped up. 

Its time for feedback. What do you want?
